name: Mass Image Downloader
short_description: Bored of spending hours trawling through galleries, browsing and saving images? Well, now there'a  solution...Mass Image Downloader! As well as downloading both static and dynamically-loaded images from webpages, Mass Image Downloader has one feature that makes it stand out from the rest: one click gallery downloads! Just paste the link to the image gallery and the program will extract the gallery links, then sequentially extract and download these full-sized, full-quality images!
summary: Download Entire Galleries in One Click!
